Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Request Payment following Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR without any prior rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment out of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Number of Request Payment activities that are preceded by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that are not dismissed (i.e., lead to Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment from all occurrences of Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Request Payment with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Number of Request Payment grouped by case:BudgetNumber
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that occur in variants where Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE is followed directly by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment followed by Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that are rejected (i.e., do not lead to Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Number of Request Payment in relation to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment among all activities in successful end-to-end reimbursement cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times Request Payment is performed after a re-submission due to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of Request Payment done after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and before any rejection step
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average number of Request Payment per declaration case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment with an increment in case:Amount compared to previous declarations in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Request Payment that follow at least one rejection (by any role) in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average number of Request Payment that are followed by Payment Handled within 24 hours
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Request Payment associated with cases that experienced Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER earlier in the trace
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Fraction of Request Payment that are eventually dismissed (i.e., no Payment Handled follows)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Request Payment over Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Occasions how often the Request Payment is performed in traces that include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: The ratio of Request Payment that are not eventually performed after Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases where 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' does not happen

Name: Percentage of Request Payment by SYSTEM resource
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases

Name: Average number of Request Payment in a month across the two-year period
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Request Payment'

Name: Total Request Payment done by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Total Request Payment performed by SYSTEM
Metric: Number of 'Request Payment' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Number of Request Payment made per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Request Payment'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
